title: What are some impossible decisions? - Quora

response.answer_text: A decision becomes impossible when two or more options present to you are equally good or equally bad for you. For example, you love aloo paratha, cheese burst pizza and american chopsuey. All three are presented to you but you can select only one. But you want both. OR In case you're married, you'd want to keep your parents happy as well as your wife happy. Both might want alone time with you, whom to give how much time and when, becomes an impossible decisions. For example, if your mother and your wife have birthdays on the same day! Whose birthday do you celebrate first? The one who has been with you every step of the way till now, or the one who will be with you every step of the way from now on? OR Getting a job in another city and staying away from your family or staying with your family and moonlighting to maintain a certain standard of living? This one is relatively easy: choose family. Conclusion: When all options are equally good or bad, the decision to choose a single one becomes impossible. :)

There are many impossible decisions. I found the following: Resisting cheese burst pizza for a long time :)Not to buy anything in a shopping fest :/Gazing a hot dude/babe and not sharing it with besty ;)Letting your loved one go away from you and not doing anything about it :(Being faithful to someone who doesn't respect you :% Doing something you don't like, for a long time :&Not helping your best friend in his/her tough time :|Witnessing some unfair mean and not doing anything about it :-Not falling in love with someone who loves you like anything :*
